title: Implement Secure Login
description: As a customer, I want secure login capabilities, so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer can securely login with username and password.
2. User session is encrypted and managed securely.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they enter valid login credentials, then they should be securely logged into the portal.

title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer is prompted for additional verification after entering valid login credentials.
2. Multi-factor authentication can be set up and managed by the user.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they enable MFA, then they should be prompted for verification on subsequent logins.

title: Ensure Data Protection
description: As a customer, I want my sensitive data to be protected, so that my financial information remains secure.
acceptance_criteria:
1. All sensitive data is encrypted at rest and in transit.
2. Compliance with regulatory security standards is maintained.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they access their data on the portal, then the data should be encrypted and secure.

title: Provide Customized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a customized dashboard, so that I can quickly access relevant banking services.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays personalized services based on user profile.
2. Quick access to recommended products is available.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they log into their dashboard, then they should see personalized banking services and recommendations.

title: Develop Responsive Interface
description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface, so that I have a consistent experience across devices.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface adapts to different screen sizes.
2. Features remain consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they access the portal on different devices, then the layout and features should be consistent and optimized.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Implement Online Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I can start banking without visiting a branch.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer can complete account opening process online.
2. Pre-filled data from user profile is utilized.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they provide required information, then they should be able to open a new account online.

title: Enable Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents directly through the portal, so that I can complete my application remotely.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can upload documents securely.
2. Uploaded files are validated and encrypted.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they upload a document, then it should be securely stored and compliant with requirements.
